This is IMO, without any doubt, the best game on steam. I have played this game for years off and on, and though the game is old, it is always so much fun. Even with the recent game 'Valorant' coming out, I believe that this is the best FPS straight up ever.

Si querés quedarte sin un peso, hacer calentar brazucas y encontrarte con chiteros, este es tu juego.
Podes abrir cajas que siempre te van a dar armas azules que valen 2 bolivares, y no importa con el brazuca que te complete, parece que todos se criaron tomando leche paterna.

Counter Strike is Counter Strike. No shooter will ever properly surpass it in sheer solid gameplay with no bullshit to clog it up. It is the cleanest, most competitive, and skill based shooter out there. Play it.
